[Wand of Crackling Lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3424)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=586" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=731" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 309 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand is made of two copper plates and a ceramic center. 

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1586), but the spell's area is twice as wide (two adjacent and parallel 120-foot lines) and creatures that fail their save are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) for 1 round.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1586) of the appropriate rank.
